page.title: 10CHANGES IN DAWLEY
page.content: {Mr Athersmith,}District Councillor for Malinslee since 1976, described the {changes in Dawley}over the last 10 years.The farm where he worked was knocked down and new Council Offices built.Small foundaries were closed and the land reclaimed for playing fields; Cricket & Football pitches,{B.M.X {Tracks,}a Putting Green & Golf Course & Sheltered accomodation for Old Age Pensioners.Dawley High Street has now become a pedestrian shopping centre. He also described the work a Council- lor does. He arranged for other people to go swimming in the{Phoenix School {Swimming Pool.}He can also help get houses repaired & rubbish removed. He also helps young couples to get their first home. The trees on{Paddock Mount planted by the '50's unemployed will be used in school playgrounds.
